tool_description: Creates, updates, and manages customer service tickets for shipping and delivery issues with priority routing.

customer_id.description: Customer ID associated with the issue

issue_type.description: Type of issue (delivery_delay, package_lost, package_damaged, address_issue, refund_request, replacement_request)

order_id.description: Order ID related to the issue

issue_description.description: Detailed description of the customer issue

customer_contact_preference.description: Preferred contact method (email, phone, chat, sms)

assigned_agent.description: Specific agent ID to assign ticket to

attachments.description: List of attachment URLs or file references

error_messages: Customer not found: The specified customer ID does not exist in the system.
Invalid issue type: Use one of (delivery_delay, package_lost, package_damaged, address_issue, refund_request, replacement_request).
Order not associated with customer: The order ID does not belong to the specified customer.
Invalid priority level: Use one of (low, medium, high, critical).
Agent not available: The assigned agent is not available or does not exist.
Description too short: Issue description must be at least 10 characters long.
Invalid contact preference: Use one of (email, phone, chat, sms).
Invalid sentiment: Use one of (positive, neutral, negative, angry).
usage: Provide customer_id, issue_type, order_id, and issue_description. Optionally set priority_level and other preferences. The tool creates a ticket and routes it appropriately based on issue type and priority.

ticket_id.description: Unique identifier for the created customer service ticket

ticket_status.description: Current status of the ticket (open, assigned, in_progress, resolved, closed)

assigned_agent_id.description: ID of the agent assigned to handle the ticket

estimated_resolution_date.description: Estimated date and time for issue resolution
